title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.

a. Buttons are too small.

b. When coming up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
OB:
a. Buttons are too small.

b. When coming up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
